multitext.text: To play this game you require the latest version Flash Player. Please click the link below and follow the quick and simple installation instructions.
Note that any Jackpots are shown and paid in your account currency.
COLLECT YOUR CURRENT WIN AND RETURN TO THE MAIN GAME

YOUR GOAL IS TO CORRECTLY GUESS WHETHER THE NEXT CARD WILL BE RED OR BLACK
CORRECT GUESSES PAY EVEN MONEY
ONLY HIGHEST WIN PAYS PER LINE
WIN COMBINATIONS PAY LEFT TO RIGHT ONLY EXCEPT
PAYLINE WINS ARE MULTIPLIED BY THE LINE BET
SUBSTITUTES FOR ALL SYMBOLS EXCEPT SCATTER
ANYWHERE ON REELS 2, 3 and 4 TRIGGERS THE GLADIATOR BONUS
THE GAME PICKS NINE RANDOM HELMETS OF DIFFERENT PRIZE VALUES, EITHER GOLD, SILVER OR BRONZE
ALL HELMET WINS ARE ADDED UP
MALFUNCTIONS VOID ALL PLAYS AND PAYS
ANYWHERE ON SCREEN TRIGGERS THE COLISEUM BONUS
STARTING AT THE BOTTOM ROW, PICK STONES TO REVEAL YOUR PRIZES
EACH ROW CONTAINS A DIFFERENT PRIZE TYPE:

. THE FIRST ROW CONTAINS FREE GAMES . THE SECOND ROW CONTAINS FREE GAME WIN MULTIPLIERS . THE THIRD ROW CONTAINS EXTRA SCATTER SYMBOLS (EXTRA SCATTER WINS WHEN SCATTERED ON REELS AND PAYS X TOTAL BET, USING THE ORIGINAL SYMBOL'S PAYTABLE) . THE FOURTH ROW CONTAINS EXTRA WILD SYMBOLS
FOR EACH PICK YOU WIN A PRIZE AND 1 OF 4 OPTIONS:
. COLLECT ALL PRIZES IN THE PICKED COLUMN . PICK ANOTHER PRIZE IN THE ROW ABOVE . PICK ANOTHER PRIZE IN THE SAME ROW . COLLECT THE PRIZE AND CONTINUE TO FREE GAMES
ON REEL 3 DURING FREE GAMES WINS 3 EXTRA FREE GAMES
THE COLISEUM BONUS CANNOT BE RETRIGGERED DURING FREE GAMES
PICK A STONE TO WIN A FREE GAMES AMOUNT
PICK AGAIN IN THIS ROW TO WIN YOUR NEXT PRIZE
PICK A STONE TO WIN A MULTIPLIER FOR FREE GAMES
PICK AGAIN IN THIS ROW TO WIN YOUR NEXT PRIZE
PICK A STONE TO WIN AN EXTRA SCATTER
PICK A STONE TO WIN AN EXTRA WILD
FIRST ROW – NUMBER OF FREE GAMES SECOND ROW – WIN MULTIPLIER DURING FREE GAMES THIRD ROW – EXTRA SCATTER DURING FREE GAMES FOURTH ROW – EXTRA WILD DURING FREE GAMES
PICK STONES TO REVEAL YOUR PRIZES EACH ROW OF STONES HIDES DIFFERENT PRIZES:

phrase.text: This bet is not currently available.
There has been an error retrieving your previous game, please refresh
You have exceeded the maximum possible winning limit for any one bet. Please change your bet or cashout.
Play for fun. If you would like to Play for Real, please log into or create an account.
You are part way through a game. Please click to resume.

GLADIATOR
5-Reel 25-line Slots The object of Gladiator is to obtain winning symbol combinations by spinning the reels.
TO PLAY THE GAME:
LINE BET Click the + and – buttons beneath ‘LINE BET’ to increase and decrease the ‘LINE BET’.
LINES Click the + and – buttons beneath ‘LINES’ to increase or decrease the ‘LINES’. Alternatively clicking the numbered buttons next to the reels will increase or decrease your paylines accordingly.
The ‘TOTAL BET’ display shows the line bet multiplied by the number of active paylines.
SPIN Clicking ‘SPIN’ spins the reels with the selected LINE BET and LINES.
BET MAX Clicking ‘BET MAX’ activates all the paylines and spins the reels.
INFO Click the ‘INFO’ button to view winning paylines and payout information. Scroll through INFO screens by using the left and right arrows. To view paylines click “SHOW PAYLINES”. To Exit the PAYTABLE click the ‘BACK’ button.
DISPLAY BOXES: LINES: Display’s the number of lines active. LINE BET: Display’s the amount staked per line. TOTAL BET: Display’s the total bet per game. WIN: Display’s the winning amount.
ABOUT PAYOUTS:
* If two winning combinations occur on the same line, the higher of them is paid out. * Win combinations must occur from left to right. *Line Bet and Total Bet are different. The line bet shows how much you're betting on a single payline. The total bet shows how much you're spending in this game round. Payouts shown in the paytable are multiplied by the line bet. If more than one active payline has a winning combination, the winnings are added up.
WILD SYMBOL: * The Wild symbol is the Helmet symbol. * The Wild symbol can appear only on reels 2, 3 and 4 and stand for any other symbol except scatter and extra scatter. * If 3 Wild symbols appear simultaneously in any position on the reels 2, 3 and 4, the Gladiator Bonus round is initiated.
SCATTER SYMBOL: * The Scatter symbol is the Coliseum symbol with the word ‘SCATTER’ on it. * Scatter symbols do not have to occur on a particular payline. * Payout for scatter symbols is multiplied by the total Bet. *If there are 2 or more Scatters in the spin results, the payout earned is multiplied by the total bet and added to payline winnings. * If 3 or more Scatter symbols appear simultaneously anywhere on the reels, the Coliseum Bonus round is initiated.
THE GLADIATOR BONUS ROUND:
* Once triggered click ‘CLICK TO START’ which replaces the ‘SPIN’ button to proceed to the Gladiator Bonus. * In the Gladiator Bonus round, a centred window reveals 9 helmets in either gold, silver or bronze, with prize values equal to 5, 3 or 1 times the total bet respectively. * The Gladiator Bonus round prize equals the total value of those 9 helmets. * Normal play will automatically resume.
THE COLISEUM BONUS ROUND:
* Once triggered, click ‘CLICK TO START’ which replaces the ‘SPIN’ button to proceed to the Coliseum Bonus. * The Coliseum Bonus round includes a grid of four rows and five columns. Starting from the bottom row, pick one stone at a time from the rows to win a prize. - The first row determines the number of free games. - The second row determines the win multiplier. - The third row reveals an Extra Scatter symbol. - The fourth row reveals an Extra Wild symbol. * Extra Wild can be one of the five theme symbols (characters from the movie Gladiator) only. * Extra Scatter can be one of the theme symbols (except Commodus and Lucilla) or one of the royal symbols (A, K, Q, J, 10, 9). * Extra Wild and Extra Scatter appear as the original symbol but act as Wild or Scatter symbol respectively. *The win multiplier applies to all line wins and Scatter and Extra Scatter wins during the Free Games.
*When a stone is picked, one of the following occurs: - The next pick is made from the row above. - An extra pick is given in the currently active row (applies only for the first and second row). - The whole column is automatically opened. - The selected stone reveals a Collect item - the bonus round ends and the Free Games start.
EXTRA WILD * Extra Wild can still win according to the payout of the original symbol when the symbols appear on an active payline. This is paid out if the win amount from the Extra Wild is larger than the win from the regular symbol. * Extra Wild does not substitute the Wild symbol towards the Gladiator Bonus round.
EXTRA SCATTER * If there are three or more Extra Scatter symbols in the Free Game results, an additional win is earned and added to payline winnings. The Extra Scatter wins according to the payout of the original symbol.
FREE GAMES * During the Free Games, the reels are spun automatically using the same number of LINES and LINE BET as on the spin that won the Coliseum Bonus. * During the Free Games, the Coliseum Bonus round cannot be retriggered. However, if Commodus appears on reel 3 during the Free Games, 3 extra Free Games are added. The win multiplier, Extra Wild and Extra Scatter symbols do not change. * During the Free Games, the Gladiator Bonus round can occur. The Free Games win multiplier does not apply on the Gladiator Bonus round prizes.
DISPLAY * SPINS LEFT – Indicates free spins remaining. * FREE GAMES WIN – Indicates current winnings from free spins. * MULTIPLIER – Indicates the multiplier.
Malfunction voids all pays and plays. This game has a Return to Player of 94.09%.
